name: Nike customer Services Chat
description:
I recently came across using the services of Nike customer service chat. I saw the potential to solve some of the following problems:

- separate window

- a lot of empty not used space

- unclear CTA

- the unclear distinction between client and customer support representative

- automatic termination of the chat in case of no response

- a well-planned protocol for chat missing

- no option to upload documents during the chat session

- actual-time estimate missing in the beginning

- no time stamps for the messages
